title: EV Chargers, Powerball Carpeting, Large Picture Windows
neighborhood: 550 N. Figueroa st., Los Angeles, CA
map_address: 550 N. Figueroa st. near Figueroa st and Cesar Chaves Ave
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Airy Interiors with Nine Foot Ceilings', '-Solid Hardwood Oak Entry Doors', '-Complementary Yoga Classes for Residents', '-Built-in Microwave', '-Outdoor', 'Shower to Rinse Off', '-Elegant Ceramic Tile Floors', '-Den/Study', '-EV Chargers', '-ATM Machines', '-Clear Glass Shower Enclosures', '-Powerball Carpeting', '-Additional Monthly Parking Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
